text.section: If a recipient of Medicaid-waiver services is denied services to be provided in accordance with a plan of habilitation under § 7-1006 of this title, the Secretary shall provide the individual with notice and an opportunity for a Medicaid fair hearing in accordance with Title 10, Subtitle 2 of the State Government Article and federal Medicaid law.

section.section:
Subject to subsection (a) of this section, an applicant for services or a recipient of services under this title may:
Request an informal hearing before the Secretary's designee on any action or inaction of the Secretary made under this title; and
Request the Secretary to review the decision of the informal hearing.
After the Secretary receives a request for a review, the Secretary shall conduct the review in accordance with Title 10, Subtitle 2 of the State Government Article.
